instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open Google+ or the Google+ app . Open the profile of the person you want to follow. You can search for their name, or tap their photo next to one of their posts or comments. Tap Follow .

On your iPhone or iPad, open Google+ or the Google+ app . Open the profile of the person you want to unfollow. You can search for their name, or tap their photo next to a comment or post they've made. Tap Following (or the name of the circle they re in). Uncheck the "Following" box. Tap Done .

On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . Tap the post you want to comment on. Tap Add a comment . Add your comment: To insert an image: Tap Add photos and then Insert image . To insert a link: Tap Add a link . You can also start typing a link and a preview should appear below it. To insert a link with a preview: Tap through the thumbnails to pick the photo you want to display with the link.
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app Find the comment you want to edit or delete. Tap your comment or tap More . Tap Edit comment , Edit post , Delete , or Delete comment . Tap Save or Ok .
On your iPhone or iPad, open Google+ or the Google+ app . Find the post you want to +1. Tap . Optional: To undo the +1, tap .

Go to Settings . Do one of the following: Tap Network & Internet > Hotspot & tethering or Tethering & portable hotspot . Tap More > Mobile network sharing or Tethering & portable hotspot . Choose whether to share via USB tethering, Portable Wi -Fi hotspot, or Bluetooth tethering. If you are going to share your phone's data connection through USB tethering, you need to first connect your phone to the computer using the provided USB cable. Note: A mobile network connection is required. Contact your mobile operator for information on data charges. Extended use of your data connection, Wi -Fi , or Bluetooth may drain the battery faster. Some features may not be available on all phones.
